title: Choose the Right Plan for You
subtitle: Whether you're an individual user or a business team, we have the right pricing plan to meet your needs

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for individual users to experience

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. The cancellation will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.

trial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
trial.answer: The free version is permanently available. Professional and Enterprise versions support a 7-day free trial.

upgrade.question: How can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
upgrade.answer: You can change your subscription plan at any time in the settings page. Changes will take effect immediately.

enterprise.question: Does the Enterprise version support customization?
enterprise.answer: Yes, the Enterprise version supports custom development and deployment according to your specific needs.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.subtitle: Our team is here to help you

messages.paymentErrorRetry: Failed to create payment order, please try again later
